title: Full Stack Developer
description: Join our Portland-based team building modern web applications. You'll work with React, TypeScript, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. We offer a flexible hybrid schedule with 2-3 days in office. Requirements: 3+ years of full-stack development, strong JavaScript/TypeScript skills, experience with React and Node.js. Tech stack: React, TypeScript, Node.js, PostgreSQL, GraphQL, Docker. Portland office in the Pearl District.
test_case_notes: Hybrid job with Portland location - should receive Portland office bonus. Tests timezone scoring and location preference filtering.
